WHO IS

SHUXING LI

> Greetings, Visitor. I am Shuxing Li, a technical artist pursuing my master's degree at the Entertainment Technology Center, of Carnegie Mellon University. I do a lot of shaders. A lot. Ever since I studied computer graphics, I fell in love with it so deeply.

If you see this page, chances are that you came from the landing page with a CRT in it. The clips on the screen are some of the creations that I created. If you missed it, or just simply want to see it in HD, here's a link to save you from going through troubles.
